messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: Huge ruckus downtown. Reports say there was a fight, then shootin. Detectve Jake Morales was first. had coffee in hand, almost spilled it. Next was sergnt Lilly Turner, rollin eyes at Jake. Lieutnant Drake seemed highstrung, kept pacing. Then cptain Marcus Lee yelled out, 'Keep it together!'. Pathrol officer Rob, he likes bein called Rob, was busy gatherin crowd statements. technitian Mikey tryna figure out why their old tech gear ain't workin. in the nearby cafe, oficer Sofia & detectve Monica argued over spilled tea. DOCUMENTS EVERYWHERE; Metropolitan PD file, ID: 7890. Saw a half-torn note by Sergeant Nia. It was kinda wet, and ink was smudged. Cornor Dr. Raj had an interesting theory bout the cause of death. but he spoke so low, hardly anyone heard. Two blocks away, Detectve Ronnie and Technitian Elsie found a weird piece of tech. not sure where it belongs. Meanwhile, Depity Ryan was clueless as always, wondering where his horse was. yes, horse. Don't ask.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Detectve Jake Morales Officer Context: Arrived first at the scene of the ruckus with a coffee in hand. Officer Role: Detective  Officer Name: Sergeant Lilly Turner Officer Context: Arrived next and was seen rolling her eyes at Jake. Officer Role: Sergeant  Officer Name: Lieutenantg Drake Officer Context: Was pacing and seemed anxious. Officer Role: Lieutenant  Officer Name: Captain Marcus Lee Officer Context: Yelled 'Keep it together!' at the scene. Officer Role: Captain  Officer Name: Patrol Officer Rob Officer Context: Was collecting statements from the gathered crowd. Prefers to be called Rob. Officer Role: Patrol Officer  Officer Name: Technichian Mikey Officer Context: Was trying to figure out issues with old tech gear. Officer Role: Technician  Officer Name: Officer Sofia Officer Context: Was at a cafe arguing with Detective Monica over spilled tea. Officer Role: Officer  Officer Name: Detectve Monica Officer Context: Involved in the argument at the cafe with Officer Sofia. Officer Role: Detective  Officer Name: Sergeant Nia Officer Context: Wrote a half-torn and smudged note. Officer Role: Sergeant  Officer Name: Cornor Dr. Raj Officer Context: Posed an interesting theory about the cause of death but spoke quietly. Officer Role: Coroner  Officer Name: Detective Ronnie Officer Context: Found a peculiar piece of tech two blocks away. Officer Role: Detective  Officer Name: Technician Elsie Officer Context: Was with Detective Ronnie and discovered the strange tech item. Officer Role: Technician  Officer Name: Deputy Ryan Officer Context: Seemed lost and was wondering about the location of his horse. Officer Role: Deputy
